key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including a $28.6 million settlement with regulators
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities highlighted by the October 2023 data breach
Economic sensitivity to housing market fluctuations and interest rate changes
Customer service issues, including delays in payment processing and dispute resolution
controversies: Class action lawsuit over the October 2023 cybersecurity breach
Multiple customer complaints recorded by the Better Business Bureau (BBB)
social_issues: Customer trust and retention issues due to service delays and data breaches
governance_issues: Potential governance challenges related to regulatory compliance and cybersecurity oversight

sources.title: Mr. Cooper Group - Wikipedia
